title: Red Sheep

Red Sheep are sick sheep found near the East Ardougne north bank that must be prodded with the cattleprod to the sheep pen and fed the poisoned sheep feed during the Sheep Herder quest. Its wool is slightly reddish. Once killed, it drops the sheep bones (1).

After Mourning's End Part I, the sheep are of a darker red as a result of the player dying them with a Fixed device loaded with a Red toad. Once dyed, they can no longer be prodded or interacted with in any way. Players only need to dye one, and all the sheep of the same colour turn more saturated. This is how players can tell they haven't missed the sheep during the quest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 July 2019
(update)

Name changed from Sick-looking sheep (1) to Red Sheep.

26 January –
27 June 2005
  • The NPC was renamed from "Diseased sheep 1" to "Sick-looking sheep (1)".
  • The NPC's examine was changed from "Even from here you can see this sheep's not well." to "The sheep looks distinctly unwell."
  • The NPC now always appears above players standing in the same tile.
